name: A meadow with lots of ants
name_original: A meadow with lots of ants
description:
- Choose one of three types of ants with different statistics.

- Your ants always follow your cursor.

- Find food on the map to increase the population, try to be bigger than your opponent.

- Hostile ants and colonies are invisible until they attack you or attack them.

- Win by destroying the enemy ant colony.

Used assets:

- Birds sound - https://audiojungle.net/item/birds-singing-2/22384246

- UI sounds - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ui-sfx-36989

A game made in 2 days for:

Quarantine Jam
